programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The buyers compete with a swarm of bidders; power tools and antique clocks await the winners.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Moe and Mary meet a qualified wood expert in the Texas town of Waxahachie; Ricky and Bubba find a strange weapon; a buyer listens to the locals to get an edge up on the competition.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.sub-title: The Surgeon, the Witch, and the Wardrobe
programme.desc: The buyers nab lockers as a tornado approaches; two bidders band together in the name of profit.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Jenny is involved in a war of the sexes; Bubba and Kenny Stowe trade blows in an auction battle for the ages.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: In Burleson, Texas, Moe hunts for oddities while Lesa and Victor battle over a pricey store display.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.sub-title: Puffy in the Sky With Diamonds
programme.desc: In Irving, Texas, one of the buyers stands to uncover a diamond in the rough.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: A stranger on a motorcycle drives up prices in the city of DeSoto, where only four lockers are up for grabs; Ricky and Bubba hope to sweep the competition.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Lesa clashes with a hot young buyer; Ricky and Bubba unearth a collection of antique gunslinger toys; Roy tries a new strategy.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.sub-title: Excuse Me, I Think You're Stupid
programme.desc: Ricky and Bubba score a collection of rockets; Cowboy Matt and East Texas Kenny fight over furniture; Matt finds an antique map.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Placentia, Calif., Jarrod and Brandi make a purchase that tips the scales in their favor; Rene and Casey buy a load of luggage; Darrell scores what he thinks is dental equipment.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: A heavy hitter who has a long history with Dave arrives in Newport Beach, Calif.; Barry visits the doctor.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Rene and Casey return to the auctions; Dave finds a piece of board game history; Jarrod and Brandi try to get a locker; Darrell and Brandon show their moves.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy is particularly excited when the buyers return to Fontana, Calif.; Darrell and Brandon look to score heavy, while Mary works her way up from the bottom.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Casey attempts to keep a rein on Rene's spending habits; Darrell and Brandon use their intuition to soar above their competitors; Ivy tries to secretly learn Jarrod and Brandi's purchasing strategy.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers visit El Monte, Calif.; the Harris Brothers go into stealth mode; Jarrod and Brandi feel charitable; Darrell hopes a big pole will vault him to the top.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell hopes to humiliate Ivy in his own backyard; Jarrod and Brandi are surrounded by pigs; Rene purchases a "crappy" locker.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The regulars encounter a mob of eager newbies in Riverside, Calif.; Barry purchases a "mystery trunk"; Darrell acquires a box of old books.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell and Brandon revisit the scene of their greatest triumph; Jarrod and Brandi are introduced to a "Herbmeister"; Rene and Casey land a sweet score.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders visit Laguna Niguel, Calif.; Jarrod and Brandi discover some toys; Ivy Calvin tries to climb out of a hole; Barry tries his luck on a safe.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Barry questions his judgement as the bidders hunt for deals in Azusa, Calif.; Darrell scores a timeless unit; Jarrod and Brandi seek quality over quantity.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers converge at a storage center in Cerritos, Calif.; Jarrod and Dave eye a unit containing handcrafted bamboo fishing rods; Brandi uses her feminine wit to outsmart her male colleagues.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders look for bargains in Huntington Beach, Calif.; Barry unearths a miniature piano that may be more than just a child's toy.
